titleStmt.title: By the Lords-Justices of Ireland. A proclamation. Charles Porter, Tho: Coningesby. Their Majesties having signified Their pleasure, that the pay of Their forces in this kingdom shall be cleared to a certain day, ...
titleStmt.author: Ireland. Lords Justices and Council.
Coningsby, Thomas Coningsby, Earl, 1656?-1729.

publicationStmt.publisher: Printed by Andrew Crook, assignee of Benjamin Tooke, printer to the King and Queens Most Excellent Majesties, on Ormonde-Key,

notesStmt.note: Title from caption and opening words of text.
"Given at Their Majesties castle of Dublin, the 27th day of January, 1690.".
Date given according to Lady Day dating.
Respecting arrears of pay to the army.--Steele.
Steele notation: Arms 201. Plea- powered 2) Pro- 3) respective Vou-.
Reproduction of original in the British Library.
